mapper.select: select ROUND(IFNULL(SUM(money),0)/10000,0) as totalAmount from ht_user_operate_list where operating=1 and create_time >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-01 00:00:00') AND create_time < DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL 1 MONTH),'%Y-%m-01 00:00:00')

select ROUND(IFNULL(SUM(money),0)/10000,0) as money , customer_group as customerGroup from ht_user_operate_list where operating=1 and create_time >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-01 00:00:00') AND create_time < DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL 1 MONTH),'%Y-%m-01 00:00:00') GROUP BY customer_group

select (select ROUND(IFNULL(SUM(money),0)/10000,0) from ht_user_operate_list where operating=1 and customer_group =1 and create_time >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-01 00:00:00') AND create_time < DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL 1 MONTH),'%Y-%m-01 00:00:00')) as scalePerformanceNew,
(select ROUND(IFNULL(SUM(money),0)/10000,0) from ht_user_operate_list where operating=1 and customer_group =2 and create_time >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-01 00:00:00') AND create_time < DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL 1 MONTH),'%Y-%m-01 00:00:00')) as scalePerformanceOld
from ht_user_operate_list LIMIT 0,1

select IFNULL(SUM(money),0) as money,current_owner as currentOwner,customer_group as customerGroup from ht_user_operate_list where operating=1 and customer_group =1 and create_time >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-01 00:00:00') AND create_time < DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL 1 MONTH),'%Y-%m-01 00:00:00') GROUP BY current_owner -- 坐席月规模业绩（新客组） UNION ALL select IFNULL(SUM(money),0) as money,current_owner as currentOwner,customer_group as customerGroup from ht_user_operate_list where operating=1 and customer_group =2 and create_time >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-01 00:00:00') AND create_time < DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL 1 MONTH),'%Y-%m-01 00:00:00') GROUP BY current_owner -- 坐席月规模业绩（老客组）

SELECT IFNULL(t3.money,0)as money,t3.currentOwner,t3.customerGroup,IFNULL(t2.money2,0) as money2 FROM(
(select ROUND(IFNULL(SUM(t1.money),0)/10000,0) as money,t1.current_owner as currentOwner ,t1.customer_group as customerGroup from ht_user_operate_list t1 where t1.operating=3 and t1.customer_group =1 and t1.create_time >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-01 00:00:00') AND t1.create_time < DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL 1 MONTH),'%Y-%m-01 00:00:00') GROUP BY currentOwner) t3 LEFT JOIN (SELECT ROUND(IFNULL(SUM(old_money),0)/10000,0) as money2,customer_name as currentOwner,customer_group as customerGroup FROM ht_repayment_plan where customer_name IS NOT null and customer_group =1 and repayment_time >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-01 00:00:00') AND repayment_time < DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL 1 MONTH),'%Y-%m-01 00:00:00') GROUP BY customer_name ) t2
on t3.currentOwner = t2.currentOwner ) UNION SELECT IFNULL(t3.money,0) as money,t2.currentOwner,t2.customerGroup,IFNULL(t2.money2,0)as money2 FROM(
(select ROUND(IFNULL(SUM(t1.money),0)/10000,0) as money,t1.current_owner as currentOwner ,t1.customer_group as customerGroup from ht_user_operate_list t1 where t1.operating=3 and t1.customer_group =1 and t1.create_time >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-01 00:00:00') AND t1.create_time < DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL 1 MONTH),'%Y-%m-01 00:00:00') GROUP BY currentOwner) t3 RIGHT JOIN (SELECT ROUND(IFNULL(SUM(old_money),0)/10000,0) as money2,customer_name as currentOwner,customer_group as customerGroup FROM ht_repayment_plan where customer_name IS NOT null and customer_group =1 and repayment_time >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-01 00:00:00') AND repayment_time < DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL 1 MONTH),'%Y-%m-01 00:00:00') GROUP BY customer_name ) t2
on t3.currentOwner = t2.currentOwner )
UNION ALL
SELECT IFNULL(t3.money,0)as money,t3.currentOwner,t3.customerGroup,IFNULL(t2.money2,0) as money2 FROM(
(select ROUND(IFNULL(SUM(t1.money),0)/10000,0) as money,t1.current_owner as currentOwner ,t1.customer_group as customerGroup from ht_user_operate_list t1 where t1.operating=3 and t1.customer_group =2 and t1.create_time >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-01 00:00:00') AND t1.create_time < DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL 1 MONTH),'%Y-%m-01 00:00:00') GROUP BY currentOwner) t3 LEFT JOIN (SELECT ROUND(IFNULL(SUM(old_money),0)/10000,0) as money2,customer_name as currentOwner,customer_group as customerGroup FROM ht_repayment_plan where customer_name IS NOT null and customer_group =2 and repayment_time >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-01 00:00:00') AND repayment_time < DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL 1 MONTH),'%Y-%m-01 00:00:00') GROUP BY customer_name ) t2
on t3.currentOwner = t2.currentOwner ) UNION SELECT IFNULL(t3.money,0) as money,t2.currentOwner,t2.customerGroup,IFNULL(t2.money2,0)as money2 FROM(
(select ROUND(IFNULL(SUM(t1.money),0)/10000,0) as money,t1.current_owner as currentOwner ,t1.customer_group as customerGroup from ht_user_operate_list t1 where t1.operating=3 and t1.customer_group =2 and t1.create_time >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-01 00:00:00') AND t1.create_time < DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL 1 MONTH),'%Y-%m-01 00:00:00') GROUP BY currentOwner) t3 RIGHT JOIN (SELECT ROUND(IFNULL(SUM(old_money),0)/10000,0) as money2,customer_name as currentOwner,customer_group as customerGroup FROM ht_repayment_plan where customer_name IS NOT null and customer_group =2 and repayment_time >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-01 00:00:00') AND repayment_time < DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL 1 MONTH),'%Y-%m-01 00:00:00') GROUP BY customer_name ) t2
on t3.currentOwner = t2.currentOwner )

select user_name userName,current_owner currentOwner,operating operating,IFNULL(money,0) money,IFNULL(year_money,0) yearMoney,DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') createTime from ht_user_operate_list where operating <> 3 and current_owner is not null and create_time >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00') AND create_time < DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL 1 DAY),'%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00') ORDER BY create_time DESC

SELECT ROUND(IFNULL(SUM(money), 0), 0) AS money, current_owner AS currentOwner, customer_group AS customerGroup FROM ht_user_operate_list WHERE operating = 1 AND customer_group = 1 AND create_time BETWEEN str_to_date( DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d'), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AND DATE_ADD( DATE_ADD( str_to_date( DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d'), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ), INTERVAL 1 DAY ), INTERVAL - 1 SECOND ) GROUP BY current_owner -- 坐席日规模业绩（新客组） UNION ALL SELECT ROUND(IFNULL(SUM(money), 0), 0) AS money, current_owner AS currentOwner, customer_group AS customerGroup FROM ht_user_operate_list WHERE operating = 1 AND customer_group = 2 AND create_time BETWEEN str_to_date( DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d'), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AND DATE_ADD( DATE_ADD( str_to_date( DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d'), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ), INTERVAL 1 DAY ), INTERVAL - 1 SECOND ) GROUP BY current_owner -- 坐席日规模业绩（老客组）

SELECT IFNULL(t3.money, 0) AS money, t3.currentOwner, t3.customerGroup, IFNULL(t2.money2, 0) AS money2 FROM ( ( SELECT ROUND(IFNULL(SUM(t1.money), 0), 0) AS money, t1.current_owner AS currentOwner, t1.customer_group AS customerGroup FROM ht_user_operate_list t1 WHERE t1.operating = 3 AND t1.customer_group = 1
AND t1.create_time >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00') AND t1.create_time < DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59')
GROUP BY currentOwner ) t3 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ROUND(IFNULL(SUM(money), 0), 0) AS money2, customer_name AS currentOwner, customer_group AS customerGroup FROM ht_repayment_plan WHERE customer_name IS NOT NULL AND customer_group = 1 AND repayment_time >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00') AND repayment_time < DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59')
GROUP BY customer_name ) t2 ON t3.currentOwner = t2.currentOwner ) UNION SELECT IFNULL(t3.money, 0) AS money, t2.currentOwner, t2.customerGroup, IFNULL(t2.money2, 0) AS money2 FROM ( ( SELECT ROUND(IFNULL(SUM(t1.money), 0), 0) AS money, t1.current_owner AS currentOwner, t1.customer_group AS customerGroup FROM ht_user_operate_list t1 WHERE t1.operating = 3 AND t1.customer_group = 1 AND t1.create_time >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00') AND t1.create_time < DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59')
GROUP BY currentOwner ) t3 RIGHT JOIN ( SELECT ROUND(IFNULL(SUM(money), 0), 0) AS money2, customer_name AS currentOwner, customer_group AS customerGroup FROM ht_repayment_plan WHERE customer_name IS NOT NULL AND customer_group = 1
AND repayment_time >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00') AND repayment_time < DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59')
GROUP BY customer_name ) t2 ON t3.currentOwner = t2.currentOwner ) UNION ALL SELECT IFNULL(t3.money, 0) AS money, t3.currentOwner, t3.customerGroup, IFNULL(t2.money2, 0) AS money2 FROM ( ( SELECT ROUND(IFNULL(SUM(t1.money), 0), 0) AS money, t1.current_owner AS currentOwner, t1.customer_group AS customerGroup FROM ht_user_operate_list t1 WHERE t1.operating = 3 AND t1.customer_group = 2 AND t1.create_time >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00') AND t1.create_time < DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59') GROUP BY currentOwner ) t3 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ROUND(IFNULL(SUM(money), 0), 0) AS money2, customer_name AS currentOwner, customer_group AS customerGroup FROM ht_repayment_plan WHERE customer_name IS NOT NULL AND customer_group = 2 AND repayment_time >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00') AND repayment_time < DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59')
GROUP BY customer_name ) t2 ON t3.currentOwner = t2.currentOwner ) UNION SELECT IFNULL(t3.money, 0) AS money, t2.currentOwner, t2.customerGroup, IFNULL(t2.money2, 0) AS money2 FROM ( ( SELECT ROUND(IFNULL(SUM(t1.money), 0), 0) AS money, t1.current_owner AS currentOwner, t1.customer_group AS customerGroup FROM ht_user_operate_list t1 WHERE t1.operating = 3 AND t1.customer_group = 2 AND t1.create_time >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00') AND t1.create_time < DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59') GROUP BY currentOwner ) t3 RIGHT JOIN ( SELECT ROUND(IFNULL(SUM(money), 0), 0) AS money2, customer_name AS currentOwner, customer_group AS customerGroup FROM ht_repayment_plan WHERE customer_name IS NOT NULL AND customer_group = 2 AND repayment_time >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00') AND repayment_time < DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59') GROUP BY customer_name ) t2 ON t3.currentOwner = t2.currentOwner )

SELECT ROUND(SUM(recharge), 0) AS recharge, currentOwner, customerGroup FROM ( SELECT IFNULL(SUM(money), 0) AS recharge, current_owner AS currentOwner, customer_group AS customerGroup FROM ht_user_operate_list WHERE operating = 2 AND customer_group = 1 AND create_time BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE(), '%Y-%m-01 00:00:00' ) AND DATE_FORMAT( LAST_DAY(CURDATE()), '%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59' ) GROUP BY current_owner UNION ALL SELECT IFNULL(SUM(t1.money), 0) AS recharge, t2.current_owner AS currentOwner, t2.customer_group AS customerGroup FROM `ht_account_recharge` t1 INNER JOIN ht_user_operate_list t2 ON t1.user_id = t2.user_id WHERE t1.TYPE = 0 AND t1.create_time BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE(), '%Y-%m-01 00:00:00' ) AND DATE_FORMAT( LAST_DAY(CURDATE()), '%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59' ) AND t2.operating = 2 AND t2.customer_group = 1 AND t2.create_time BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE(), '%Y-%m-01 00:00:00' ) AND DATE_FORMAT( LAST_DAY(CURDATE()), '%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59' ) GROUP BY current_owner ) t1 GROUP BY currentOwner
UNION ALL
SELECT ROUND(SUM(recharge), 0) AS recharge, currentOwner, customerGroup FROM ( SELECT IFNULL(SUM(money), 0) AS recharge, current_owner AS currentOwner, customer_group AS customerGroup FROM ht_user_operate_list WHERE operating = 2 AND customer_group = 2 AND create_time BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE(), '%Y-%m-01 00:00:00' ) AND DATE_FORMAT( LAST_DAY(CURDATE()), '%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59' ) GROUP BY current_owner UNION ALL SELECT IFNULL(SUM(t1.money), 0) AS recharge, t2.current_owner AS currentOwner, t2.customer_group AS customerGroup FROM `ht_account_recharge` t1 INNER JOIN ht_user_operate_list t2 ON t1.user_id = t2.user_id WHERE t1.TYPE = 0 AND t1.create_time BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE(), '%Y-%m-01 00:00:00' ) AND DATE_FORMAT( LAST_DAY(CURDATE()), '%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59' ) AND t2.operating = 2 AND t2.customer_group = 2 AND t2.create_time BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE(), '%Y-%m-01 00:00:00' ) AND DATE_FORMAT( LAST_DAY(CURDATE()), '%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59' ) GROUP BY current_owner ) t1 GROUP BY currentOwner

SELECT ROUND(IFNULL(SUM(year_money), 0), 0) AS yearMoney, current_owner AS currentOwner, customer_group AS customerGroup FROM ht_user_operate_list WHERE operating = 1 AND customer_group = 1 AND create_time BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE(), '%Y-%m-01 00:00:00' ) AND DATE_FORMAT( LAST_DAY(CURDATE()), '%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59' ) GROUP BY current_owner UNION ALL SELECT ROUND(IFNULL(SUM(year_money), 0), 0) AS yearMoney, current_owner AS currentOwner, customer_group AS customerGroup FROM ht_user_operate_list WHERE operating = 1 AND customer_group = 2 AND create_time BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE(), '%Y-%m-01 00:00:00' ) AND DATE_FORMAT( LAST_DAY(CURDATE()), '%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59' ) GROUP BY current_owner

SELECT ROUND(IFNULL(SUM(money), 0), 0) AS received, current_owner AS currentOwner, customer_group AS customerGroup FROM ht_user_operate_list WHERE operating = 3 AND customer_group = 1 AND create_time BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE(), '%Y-%m-01 00:00:00' ) AND DATE_FORMAT( LAST_DAY(CURDATE()), '%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59' ) GROUP BY current_owner UNION ALL SELECT ROUND(IFNULL(SUM(money), 0), 0) AS received, current_owner AS currentOwner, customer_group AS customerGroup FROM ht_user_operate_list WHERE operating = 3 AND customer_group = 2 AND create_time BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE(), '%Y-%m-01 00:00:00' ) AND DATE_FORMAT( LAST_DAY(CURDATE()), '%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59' ) GROUP BY current_owner
